newsitem.title: USA: U.S. debt futures finish lower in lifeless trade.
newsitem.headline: U.S. debt futures finish lower in lifeless trade.

text.p: Aug 21 - U.S. debt futures finished lower in lifeless trade. Traders attributed the weak tone to the decline in the German bund market overnight. Sept T-bonds contained losses at 110-14/32, above support at 110-12/32 to 110-00. Weekly jobless claims on Thursday at 0830 EDT/1230 GMT seen rising to 331,000, versus 321,000 in the prior week. -Derivatives Desk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
